name: test_e2e_with_logs[513_CRLF_LOG_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CRLF_LOG_003` |
| **Name** | Fake Admin Access Log via CRLF |
| **Category** | CRLF |
| **Subcategory** | log_injection |
| **Severity** | `MEDIUM` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `\r\n127.0.0.1 GET /admin 200`
- **Encoded**: `%0d%0a127.0.0.1%20GET%20%2Fadmin%20200`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~4000ms
- **Timestamp**: 09:06:38.000 UTC

|------|-------|

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
